title: Ep. 1008 - TikTok Deplatforms Michael Knowles
description:
BLM gets caught funneling nearly $1 million to the co-founder’s baby-daddy, Elon Musk officially becomes a Republican, and TikTok deplatforms Michael!

I’m exposing the most successful failure in government history. Stream Fauci Unmasked here: https://utm.io/ueogL 

NBA star Jonathan Isaac has withstood immense pressure to conform to popular social issues. He wrote a book about his experience and it is available now: https://utm.io/ud96e

Join Michael and the Daily Wire for Backstage Live At The Ryman on June 29th. Get your tickets now: https://utm.io/uezFr 

—
